translation.en: Man: IT HAS BEEN ONE TOUGH YEAR FOR OUR SCHOOL,

translation.en: BUT THAT ALL ENDS THIS SATURDAY!

translation.en: BECAUSE THAT'S WHEN THIS TEAM, MY WARRIORS,
translation.zh: 因为到那时我们的队伍我的勇士们

translation.en: ARE GONNA BURN THOSE PANSY-ASS OHIO PLAYERS

translation.en: RIGHT TO THE GROUND!
translation.zh: 打得落花流水！

translation.en: Connor: AND STOP ACTING LIKE A LITTLE BITCH BABY.
translation.zh: 别再像个孩子一样闹脾气

translation.en: HEY. AAH!

translation.en: SORRY IT TOOK SO LONG.
translation.zh: 抱歉这么久才来

translation.en: I WENT BACK FOR THIS.
translation.zh: 我回去拿这个了

translation.en: NOW, YOU -- YOU TAKE THAT BACK RIGHT NOW!
translation.zh: 你马上把那个拿回去！

translation.en: NO. IT'S SMART.
translation.zh: 不要 这样很聪明

translation.en: COMMONWEALTH v. DELOATCHE --
translation.zh: 政府控告迪洛奇案…

translation.en: A CASE THE PROSECUTION SHOULD'VE WON BUT LOST
translation.zh: 公诉方本来应该赢却输了的案子

translation.en: BECAUSE THERE WAS NO MURDER WEAPON.
translation.zh: 因为没找到凶器

translation.en: SO, WHAT ARE YOU SAYING? WE CLEAN IT AND WE PUT IT BACK.
translation.zh: -那你意思是？-把它擦干净放回去

translation.en: HIDE IT IN PLAIN SIGHT.
translation.zh: 最危险的地方最安全

translation.en: AFTER WE BURY THE BODY.
translation.zh: 但要先把尸体埋掉

translation.en: NO, ABSOLUTELY NOT.
translation.zh: 不行 绝对不行

translation.en: YEAH, I-I-I-I'M WITH MICHAELA.
translation.zh: 我赞同米凯拉

translation.en: NO, CONNOR, THINK.
translation.zh: 不 康纳 好好想想 我们是需要奖杯但尸体要留在原地

translation.en: THE TROPHY WE NEED, YES. BUT THE BODY STAYS WHERE IT IS.
translation.zh: 我们是需要奖杯但尸体要留在原地

translation.en: NO, THE BODY IS WHAT GETS US CAUGHT.
translation.zh: 不行 尸体会害我们被抓的

translation.en: YOU ARE NOT THINKING STRAIGHT. WHAT DO YOU SUGGEST?!
translation.zh: -你脑子不清醒-那你有什么建议？ 只要不是在一年中最热闹的夜晚

translation.en: SOMETHING THAT DOESN'T INVOLVE CARRYING A BODY
translation.zh: 只要不是在一年中最热闹的夜晚 扛着一具尸体穿过校园就行！

translation.en: ACROSS CAMPUS ON THE BUSIEST NIGHT OF THE YEAR!
translation.zh: 扛着一具尸体穿过校园就行！

translation.en: Connor: SHE'S RIGHT, LAUREL.
translation.zh: 她说得对 萝瑞尔

translation.en: EVEN IF WE GET IT OUT OF THE HOUSE, UNSEEN,
translation.zh: 就算没人看到我们把尸体弄出屋外

translation.en: THE GROUND IS FROZEN! WE HAVE ALL NIGHT TO DIG.
translation.zh: -地上也结冰了！-我们有一整晚可挖

translation.en: YOU DON'T KNOW WHAT YOU'RE TALKING ABOUT!
translation.zh: 你根本不知道自己在说什么！

translation.en: THIS IS MURDER! NONE OF US KNOW WHAT WE'RE TALKING ABOUT!
translation.zh: 这是谋杀！没人知道自己在说什么

translation.en: JUST YELL THAT A LITTLE LOUDER!
translation.zh: 你声音再大点！

translation.en: HONESTLY, YOU'RE ALL DUMBER THAN I THOUGHT IF YOU THINK...
translation.zh: 你们比我想的蠢…

translation.en: LOOK, I'M AGREEING WITH YOU --
translation.zh: 我同意你的话… 有点胆量 动动脑子要不我们都得进监狱

translation.en: YOU TWO NEED TO MAN UP AND THINK BECAUSE WE'RE GOING TO JAIL.
translation.zh: 有点胆量 动动脑子要不我们都得进监狱

translation.en: SHUT UP! SHUT UP!
translation.zh: 闭嘴！

translation.en: IT'S TWO AGAINST TWO.
translation.zh: 现在是二对二

translation.en: WE HAVE NO OTHER CHOICE. WE FLIP A COIN.
translation.zh: 没办法 扔硬币决定

translation.en: THAT IS THE DUMBEST THING YOU'VE EVER SAID.
translation.zh: -这是你说过最蠢的话-我才不会让一枚硬币

translation.en: I'M NOT LETTING A FREAKING COIN DECIDE WHETHER OR NOT I GO TO JAIL TONIGHT!
translation.zh: 决定我今晚会不会进监狱！

translation.en: WE DON'T HAVE TIME TO FIGHT!
translation.zh: 我们没时间吵了！

translation.en: WE NEED TO MAKE A DECISION AND COMMIT TO IT.
translation.zh: 我们得作出决定 彻底实行

translation.en: SO IF SOMEONE HAS A BETTER IDEA, SAY IT NOW!
translation.zh: 谁有更好的主意 就快说！

translation.en: HEADS, WE GET THE BODY.
translation.zh: 正面 我们就去搬尸体

translation.en: TAILS, WE LEAVE IT WHERE IT IS. OKAY?
translation.zh: 反面 就把尸体留在原地好吗？

translation.en: ♪ LET ME SING A SONG FOR YOU ♪
translation.zh: 3个月前

translation.en: ♪ AH-OOH, I'D BE FOR YOU ♪ ♪ I'D BE FOR YOU ♪
translation.zh: 米德尔顿法学院

translation.en: WORRIED SHE'S GONNA CALL ON ME.
translation.zh: 我今早吐了四次

translation.en: YEAH, SHE'S A BALLBUSTER, SURE,
translation.zh: 担心被她点名 是啊 她确实很可怕

translation.en: BUT I SPENT MY SUMMER INTERNING FOR CHIEF JUSTICE ROBERTS,
translation.zh: 但我暑假在罗伯茨审判长那里实习

translation.en: SO I KNOW HOW TO HANDLE A BIG PERSONALITY.
translation.zh: 所以我懂得跟大人物打交道

translation.en: DERSHOWITZ HAS THE UPPER HAND IN THE ACADEMIC WORLD,
translation.zh: 德肖维茨在学术界占上风

translation.en: BUT KEATING'S CLEARLY THE BETTER DEFENSE ATTORNEY.
translation.zh: 基廷显然是更优秀的辩护律师

translation.en: [ EXHALES SHARPLY ] HERE WE GO.
translation.zh: 开始了

translation.en: I'M NOT USUALLY A FIRST-ROW KIND OF GUY,
translation.zh: 我通常不会坐第一排

translation.en: BUT I PROMISED MYSELF I WOULDN'T HIDE IN THE BACK OF THE CLASS.
translation.zh: 但我答应自己不会躲在教室后面

translation.en: I'M ENGAGED.
translation.zh: 我订婚了

translation.en: OH. OH, NO. I-I WASN'T HITTING ON...
translation.zh: 不 我不是想勾搭…

translation.en: SEATS ARE ASSIGNED. THERE'S A CHART OVER THERE.
translation.zh: 座位分配好了 那边有张表格

translation.en: NICE TRY, PLAYER.
translation.zh: 想得美 伙计

translation.en: NO. I WASN'T TRYING ANYTHING... YOU SHOULD FIND YOUR SEAT.
translation.zh: -不 我没打算…-去找你的座位吧

translation.en: YOU DON'T WANT TO BE A SITTING DUCK WHEN THE SHOOTER GETS HERE.
translation.zh: 枪手来时你可不会想坐以待毙

translation.en: WHAT?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: OH, MY GOD. YOU HAVE NO IDEA WHAT YOU JUST WALKED INTO.
translation.zh: 老天 你根本搞不清楚状况

translation.en: Annalise: GOOD MORNING.
translation.zh: 早上好

translation.en: I DON'T KNOW WHAT TERRIBLE THINGS YOU'VE DONE IN YOUR LIFE
translation.zh: 我不知道你们这辈子做了什么坏事

translation.en: UP TO THIS POINT, BUT CLEARLY YOUR KARMA'S OUT OF BALANCE
translation.zh: 但显然你们没积德

translation.en: TO GET ASSIGNED TO MY CLASS.
translation.zh: 才会被分来上我的课

translation.en: I'M PROFESSOR ANNALISE KEATING, AND THIS IS CRIMINAL LAW 100.
translation.zh: 我是安娜莉丝基廷教授这是刑法学入门课程

translation.en: OR, AS I PREFER TO CALL IT...
translation.zh: 我更喜欢称之为…

translation.en: ...HOW TO GET AWAY WITH MURDER.
translation.zh: 如何逍遥法外

translation.en: UNLIKE MANY OF MY COLLEAGUES,
translation.zh: 不同于我的许多同僚

translation.en: I WILL NOT BE TEACHING YOU HOW TO STUDY THE LAW
translation.zh: 我不会教你们如何学习法律

translation.en: OR THEORIZE ABOUT IT,
translation.zh: 或将其理论化

translation.en: BUT RATHER HOW TO PRACTICE IT --
translation.zh: 而是如何在法庭上

translation.en: IN A COURTROOM, LIKE A REAL LAWYER.
translation.zh: 进行实践 像个真正的律师

translation.en: NOW TO OUR FIRST CASE STUDY, THE ASPIRIN ASSASSIN.
translation.zh: 来看第一个案例研究阿司匹林杀手

translation.en: TELL US THE FACTS...
translation.zh: 跟我们说说客观事实…

translation.en: ...CONNOR WALSH.
translation.zh: 康纳沃许

translation.en: THE COMMONWEALTH v. GINA SADOWSKI
translation.zh: 吉娜萨多斯基公诉案

translation.en: WAS A CASE OF ATTEMPTED MURDER.
translation.zh: 是一起谋杀未遂案

translation.en: THE DEFENDANT, MS. SADOWSKI, WORKED AS THE SECOND ASSISTANT
translation.zh: 被告萨多斯基小姐

translation.en: TO THE VICTIM, ARTHUR KAUFMAN,
translation.zh: 是被害人亚瑟考夫曼的第二助理

translation.en: THE C.E.O. OF AN ADVERTISING AGENCY.
translation.zh: 他是一家广告公司的首席执行官

translation.en: MS. SADOWSKI WAS NOT ONLY HIS ASSISTANT, THOUGH.
translation.zh: 但萨多斯基小姐不仅是他的助手

translation.en: SHE WAS ALSO HIS MISTRESS.
translation.zh: 也是他的情妇

translation.en: WHAT HAPPENED AFTER MR. KAUFMAN'S WIFE OF 27 YEARS,
translation.zh: 与考夫曼先生结缡27年的妻子

translation.en: AGNES, FOUND OUT ABOUT THE AFFAIR?
translation.zh: 艾格妮丝发现婚外情后发生了什么事？

translation.en: YOU.
translation.zh: 你说

translation.en: HE ENDED THE RELATIONSHIP
translation.zh: 他结束了这段恋情

translation.en: AND TRANSFERRED HER TO THE ACCOUNTING DEPARTMENT.
translation.zh: 他结束了这段恋情 并把她调到会计部门

translation.en: THAT'S WHEN SHE ALLEGEDLY SWITCHED
translation.zh: 据说她就是在那时

translation.en: ONE OF HIS BLOOD PRESSURE PILLS FOR AN ASPIRIN,
translation.zh: 将他的一片降压药换成了阿司匹林

translation.en: WHICH SHE KNEW HE WAS ALLERGIC TO.
translation.zh: 而她明知他对阿司匹林过敏

translation.en: WHAT OCCURRED WHEN MR. KAUFMAN INGESTED THE ASPIRIN?
translation.zh: 考夫曼服下阿司匹林后发生了什么事？

translation.en: ANYONE?
translation.zh: 谁来回答？

translation.en: MR. KAUFMAN WENT INTO ANAPHYLACTIC SHOCK.
translation.zh: 考夫曼先生出现过敏性休克

translation.en: HIS THROAT SWELLED AND HIS BRAIN WAS DEPRIVED OF OXYGEN
translation.zh: 他的喉咙肿大大脑缺氧七分钟后

translation.en: FOR 7 MINUTES BEFORE HIS FIRST ASSISTANT
translation.zh: 他的第一助理

translation.en: WAS ABLE TO RESUSCITATE HIM.
translation.zh: 才让他恢复意识

translation.en: MICHAELA PRATT.
translation.zh: 我叫米凯拉普拉特

translation.en: SO, WE'VE ESTABLISHED THE ACTUS REUS.
translation.zh: 现在我们已建立犯罪客观因素

translation.en: WHAT WAS THE MENS REA?
translation.zh: 那犯罪主观因素是什么？

translation.en: WESLEY GIBBINS?
translation.zh: 韦斯里吉宾斯？

translation.en: THE...MENS REA?
translation.zh: 犯罪主观因素？

translation.en: RIGHT.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: DAY 1 AND YOU'RE UNPREPARED? NO.
translation.zh: -第一天上课你就没准备？-不是的 我确实没有但我不知道要做准备

translation.en: WELL, UM, YES, BUT I DIDN'T KNOW THERE WAS ANYTHING TO PREPARE.
translation.zh: 我确实没有但我不知道要做准备

translation.en: I E-MAILED THE ASSIGNMENT TO THE ENTIRE CLASS TWO DAYS AGO.
translation.zh: 我两天前就把作业用电邮发给全班了 我…没收到

translation.en: OH. I...DIDN'T GET THAT.
translation.zh: 我…没收到

translation.en: MR. GIBBINS, AS A DEFENSE ATTORNEY,
translation.zh: 吉宾斯先生作为一名辩护律师

translation.en: I SPEND MOST OF MY TIME AROUND PROFESSIONAL LIARS,
translation.zh: 我大部分时间都在跟职业骗子打交道

translation.en: SO YOU HAVE TO WORK REALLY HARD TO FOOL ME.
translation.zh: 所以你想要骗我得下点功夫才行

translation.en: I ONLY GOT ACCEPTED HERE TWO DAYS AGO...
translation.zh: 我两天前才被学校录取…

translation.en: FROM THE WAIT LIST,
translation.zh: 之前一直是候补

translation.en: SO THAT'S PROBABLY WHY YOU DIDN'T GET MY E-MAIL ADDRESS.
translation.zh: 也许这就是你没有我邮箱地址的原因

translation.en: LET ME HELP YOU OUT.
translation.zh: 我给你点提示

translation.en: "ACTUS REUS" MEANS "GUILTY ACT" --
translation.zh: 我给你点提示 犯罪客观因素意思是"犯罪行为"

translation.en: THE POISONING OF MR. KAUFMAN WITH AN ASPIRIN --
translation.zh: 犯罪客观因素意思是"犯罪行为" 也就是用阿司匹林毒害考夫曼先生

translation.en: WHEREAS "MENS REA" MEANS "GUILTY MIND."
translation.zh: 也就是用阿司匹林毒害考夫曼先生 而犯罪主观因素是指"犯罪心态"

translation.en: SO WHAT WAS MS. SADOWSKI'S MENS REA?
translation.zh: 那萨多斯基小姐的犯罪主观因素是什么？

translation.en: THINK, MR. GIBBINS.
translation.zh: 好好想想 吉宾斯先生

translation.en: IT'S NOTHING MORE THAN COMMON SENSE.
translation.zh: 好好想想 吉宾斯先生 只是常识而已

translation.en: Laurel: TO KILL.
translation.zh: 为了杀他

translation.en: WILL THE INDIVIDUAL WHO JUST SPOKE
translation.zh: 刚才说话的同学

translation.en: PLEASE STAND AND REPEAT THE ANSWER?
translation.zh: 请站起来再回答一次

translation.en: THE MENS REA, ALSO REFERRED TO AS "INTENT,"
translation.zh: 犯罪主观因素 即犯罪意图

translation.en: WAS TO KILL MR. KAUFMAN.
translation.zh: 是为了杀害考夫曼先生

translation.en: THAT'S RIGHT. YOUR NAME?
translation.zh: 没错 你叫什么？

translation.en: LAUREL CASTILLO.
translation.zh: 萝瑞尔卡斯提奥

translation.en: NEVER TAKE A LEARNING OPPORTUNITY AWAY
translation.zh: 永远不要抢走

translation.en: FROM ANOTHER STUDENT,
translation.zh: 同学的学习机会

translation.en: NO MATTER HOW SMART YOU NEED EVERYONE TO THINK YOU ARE.
translation.zh: 不管你想要别人觉得你多聪明

translation.en: ALL RIGHT, BEFORE WE MOVE ON, ARE THERE ANY OTHER QUESTIONS?
translation.zh: 好 在讲下一部分前有其他问题吗？

translation.en: MR. WALSH.
translation.zh: 沃许先生

translation.en: I NOTICED THAT THE VERDICT WASN'T LISTED HERE.
translation.zh: 我发现这里并没有写明判决

translation.en: SO I GUESS MY QUESTION IS, DID SHE DO IT?
translation.zh: 所以我的问题是是她干的吗？

translation.en: WHY DON'T YOU ASK HER YOURSELF?
translation.zh: 不如你自己去问她吧？

translation.en: I LIED. THIS ISN'T A PAST CASE BUT ONE I TOOK LAST WEEK
translation.zh: 我撒谎 此非旧案 安娜莉丝基廷事务所刑事辩护律师

translation.en: AFTER GINA FIRED HER PREVIOUS LAWYER.
translation.zh: 安娜莉丝基廷事务所刑事辩护律师 而是我在上周吉娜辞退前任律师后接手的

translation.en: THIS ONE DAY, I WALKED INTO HIS OFFICE
translation.zh: 这一天 我走进他的办公室

translation.en: WHEN I JUST SCREAMED, REAL LOUD,
translation.zh: 我放声尖叫

translation.en: 'CAUSE ARTHUR WAS STANDING THERE BEHIND THE DOOR.
translation.zh: 因为亚瑟就站在门后

translation.en: [ CHUCKLES ] I THOUGHT HE WAS GONNA BE PISSED AT ME, YELL,
translation.zh: 我以为他会生气 大吼

translation.en: BUT INSTEAD HE JUST STARTED LAUGHIN'.
translation.zh: 结果他反而笑了起来

translation.en: SO THEN I STARTED LAUGHIN' AND, WELL, UM,
translation.zh: 然后我也笑了

translation.en: THAT'S WHEN HE KISSED ME FOR THE FIRST TIME AND...
translation.zh: 那是他第一次吻我

translation.en: YEAH, I BECAME THAT GIRL.
translation.zh: 没错 我成了那种女人

translation.en: SOMETHING TELLS ME SHE'S ALWAYS BEEN "THAT GIRL."
translation.zh: 我有种感觉她一直都是"那种女人"

translation.en: IT WAS ON MY LAST DAY WORKIN' FOR HIM
translation.zh: 在我为他工作的最后一天

translation.en: WHEN I CAME BACK FROM LUNCH AND SAW THE PARAMEDICS.
translation.zh: 我吃完午餐回来看到了急救人员

translation.en: WHEN I HEARD THAT ARTHUR WAS HURT...
translation.zh: 当我听说亚瑟受了伤…

translation.en: I LOVED HIM.
translation.zh: 我爱他

translation.en: I KNOW THAT'S HARD TO BELIEVE, BUT I LOVED HIM.
translation.zh: 我知道这很难相信但我爱他

translation.en: [ Voice breaking ] WHY IN THE HELL WOULD I WANT TO HURT HIM?
translation.zh: 我怎么可能会想伤害他？

translation.en: Annalise: THE TRIAL BEGINS IN TWO DAYS,
translation.zh: 两天后开始庭审

translation.en: SO TOMORROW, EACH OF YOU HAVE ONE MINUTE
translation.zh: 所以明天你们每人有一分钟时间

translation.en: TO PRESENT THE BEST DEFENSE FOR THIS CASE.
translation.zh: 陈述此案的最佳辩护方案

translation.en: SEE IF YOU CAN BEAT MY CURRENT PLAN.
translation.zh: 看你们能否超越我现有的方案

translation.en: MR. GIBBINS? YES?
translation.zh: -吉宾斯先生？-在？

translation.en: YOU'LL GO LAST, AN UNENVIABLE POSITION
translation.zh: 你最后讲 可不是好事

translation.en: SEEING THAT NO TWO STUDENTS WILL BE ALLOWED
translation.zh: 因为不允许提出 与别人相同的方案

translation.en: TO PRESENT THE SAME IDEA.
translation.zh: 与别人相同的方案

translation.en: USE THE RESOURCES IN THIS OFFICE --
translation.zh: 你们可以使用这间办公室里的所有资源

translation.en: GINA'S DISCOVERY FILE, MY LIBRARY,
translation.zh: 吉娜的取证文件我的图书馆

translation.en: THE PEOPLE WHO KNOW ME EVEN BETTER THAN MYSELF --
translation.zh: 还有比我更了解我自己的同事

translation.en: MY ASSOCIATES.
translation.zh: 还有比我更了解我自己的同事 我叫法兰克跟你们以往的老师不同

translation.en: NAME'S FRANK, AND UNLIKE EVERY TEACHER YOU'VE HAD,
translation.zh: 我叫法兰克跟你们以往的老师不同

translation.en: I DO BELIEVE THERE ARE STUPID QUESTIONS.
translation.zh: 我认为有的问题就是很蠢

translation.en: SO IF YOU GOT 'EM, PLEASE SEE MY LOVELY COLLEAGUE BONNIE.
translation.zh: 所以如果你们想问的话请找我亲爱的同事邦妮

translation.en: OR, BETTER, YOU COULD COME TO US WITH ANSWERS.
translation.zh: 或直接带着答案来找我们更好

translation.en: WE'LL LIKE YOU MUCH BETTER THAT WAY.
translation.zh: 那样我们会更喜欢你们

translation.en: AND ONE MORE THING.
translation.zh: 还有一件事

translation.en: EVERY YEAR I CHOOSE FOUR STUDENTS TO COME WORK FOR ME.
translation.zh: 每年我选出四位学生为我工作

translation.en: THIS ASSIGNMENT IS USED TO HELP ME DECIDE WHO THAT IS.
translation.zh: 这份作业是用来帮我决定人选

translation.en: THE TOP STUDENT GETS THIS.
translation.zh: 最优秀的学生得到这个机会

translation.en: CONSIDER THIS YOUR IMMUNITY IDOL.
translation.zh: 这是你们的免死金牌

translation.en: YOU -- YOU TAKE THAT BACK RIGHT NOW!
translation.zh: 你马上把那个拿回去！

translation.en: THE WINNER CAN TURN THIS IN AT ANY POINT
translation.zh: 优胜者可以随时以此

translation.en: TO GET OUT OF AN EXAM. NOW GO.
translation.zh: 换取一次考试豁免权现在去吧

translation.en: FIND A DEFENSE THAT WILL FREE OUR CLIENT.
translation.zh: 找到能帮当事人脱罪的辩护方案

translation.en: THE FIRST ASSISTANT SAW GINA WITH AN ASPIRIN THAT MORNING.
translation.zh: 第一助理那天早上看到吉娜拿着阿司匹林

translation.en: FORENSICS FOUND ASPIRIN RESIDUE ON THE PLATE.
translation.zh: 鉴证科在盘子上发现阿司匹林残渣

translation.en: SHE WAS WARNED ABOUT THE ALLERGY FIRST DAY ON THE JOB,
translation.zh: 鉴证科在盘子上发现阿司匹林残渣 第一天上班就有人提醒她亚瑟对此过敏

translation.en: WHICH MEANS WE SHOULD ARGUE... WE SHOULD ARGUE...
translation.zh: 也就是我们应该说…我们应该说…

translation.en: [ SIGHS ] WHICH MEANS WE SHOULD ARGUE...
translation.zh: 也就是我们应该说…

translation.en: WE SHOULD ARGUE... MEANS WE SHOULD ARGUE...
translation.zh: 我们应该也就是我们应该说…

translation.en: SHE'S GUILTY.
translation.zh: 她有罪

translation.en: HI. WES.
translation.zh: 你好 我叫韦斯

translation.en: I JUST MOVED IN NEXT DOOR.
translation.zh: 我刚搬到隔壁

translation.en: WHAT DO YOU WANT? UH, YOUR MUSIC...
translation.zh: -你想干吗？-你的音乐…
